mapper.select: SELECT count(*) cnt FROM t_offer_judge_info oji LEFT JOIN t_offer_info oi ON oji.offer_id = oi.id WHERE oi.organ_id = #{organId} AND oji.`status` = "0"

SELECT count(*) totalCnt, sum(oji.`status` = "0") unFinishCnt, sum(oji.`status` = "1") finishCnt FROM t_offer_judge_info oji LEFT JOIN t_offer_info oi ON odt.offer_id = oi.id WHERE oi.organ_id = #{organId} AND DATE_FORMAT( oji.create_time, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y%m' )

SELECT count(*) totalCnt, sum(oji.schedu_status = "0") unFinishCnt, sum(oji.schedu_status = "1") finishCnt FROM t_offer_judge_info oji LEFT JOIN t_offer_info oi ON oji.offer_id = oi.id WHERE oi.organ_id = #{organId} AND YEAR ( oji.create_time ) = YEAR ( NOW() )

SELECT opf.check_standard_id checkStandardId, opf.secd_class_id secdClassId, jo.judge_organ_name judgeOrganName FROM t_offer_factor_organ ofo LEFT JOIN t_judge_organ jo ON ofo.organ_id = jo.id LEFT JOIN t_offer_plan_factor opf ON ofo.plan_factor_id = opf.id where opf.offer_id = #{offerId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} and ofo.organ_id != #{organId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
